name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.expire-after-access-minutes
description:
The length of time after an entry is last accessed that it
    should be automatically removed.

name: dfs.datanode.max.slowdisks.to.exclude
description:
The number of slow disks that needs to be excluded. By default, this parameter is set to 0,
    which disables excluding slow disk when choosing volume.

name: mapreduce.job.counters.max
description: The max number of user counters allowed per job.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.rolledits.timeout
description: The timeout in seconds of calling rollEdits RPC on Active NN.

name: mapreduce.job.maps
description:
The default number of map tasks per job.
  Ignored when mapreduce.framework.name is "local".

name: hadoop.zk.num-retries
description: Number of tries to connect to ZooKeeper.

name: dfs.balancer.moverThreads
description:
Thread pool size for executing block moves.
    moverThreadAllocator
